thread.title_full: My stay at hotel Eclat - Beijing - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Fabrizio P
title: My stay at hotel Eclat - Beijing
text: My stay was really wonderfull. The hotel offers all the services at a top level. Room quiet, very comfortable, and cosy. In particular the personnel has been very helpfull for the hotel service advices and for the city ones. Special mention is for Jessica, very kind and professional.
